title: Help me plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz:(
body: I need to pay money to riot cuz some dumbass hack my acc n idk how or where to pay. help plzzzz

replies.body:
Ouch, that sounds like a nasty situation. You can find out how to pay back a negative balance in our [**Chargebacks FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks).

If you need help along the way or have other account-related questions, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
